org.apache.flink.util

Interface Collector<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainedCollectorMapDriver, ChainedDriver, ChainedFlatMapDriver, ChainedMapDriver, ChainedTerminationCriterionDriver, CopyingListCollector, DirectedStreamCollector, ListCollector, OutputCollector, RecordOutputCollector, SolutionSetFastUpdateOutputCollector, SolutionSetObjectsUpdateOutputCollector, SolutionSetUpdateOutputCollector, StreamCollector, SynchronousChainedCombineDriver, TupleWrappingCollector, UnilateralSortMerger.InputDataCollector, WorksetUpdateOutputCollector

    public interface Collector<T>
    Collects a record and forwards it. The collector is the "push" counterpart of the Iterator, which "pulls" data in.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the collector.
      void collect(T record)
      Emits a record.

    • Method Detail

      • collect

        void collect(T record)
        Emits a record.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to collect.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the collector. If any data was buffered, that data will be flushed.
